title: Distribusi audio simplek tanpa kabel
abstract: At the language course in order to distribute the audio sound, usually used an audio system which placed in the front of the class. With this system not all the student can hear clearly, especially in position back of the class. That's why transceveir and receiver system wireless made for. This system used FM wave to transmite dan receive it back to headphone. The result of the system showed that the system can distribute the audio correctly but the sound can't hear clearly because exists too many noise.
contributors: YOHANES T. D. S (Advisor 1); HERLIANTO TENGGARA (Examination Committee 1)
subjects: RADIO FREQUENCY MODULATION-RECEIVERS AND RECEPTION; RADIO FREQUENCY MODULATION
